definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
to change shape in a single shake/fig. to take on a new lease of life
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
a legendary tree that sheds coins when shaken/a source of easy money (idiom)
to draw the winning ticket (in a lottery)

sentences.english: What makes the candle blow so?
Fluttering red smile, only for the drunk.
sentences.chinese: 隨風飄搖紅塵一笑，只爲醉逍遙。

sentences.english: I couldn’t resist rolling down the window. As soon as I did, I heard waves crashing along the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 我忍不住搖下車窗，立即聽到了波濤沖刷海岸的聲音。

sentences.english: Worrying is like a rocking chair, it gives you something to do, but it gets you nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 憂慮就像坐在搖椅上，只會原地搖，哪裏也到不了。

sentences.english: Many records have been set by people who love to hula hoop.
sentences.chinese: 熱愛搖呼拉圈的人創下了許多紀錄。

sentences.english: The cake dor shakes a naked snake dawn the quaking rake lacking sake.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕製造者無緣無故地用抖動的耙子搖一條赤的蛇。

sentences.english: The cake maker all-overs a naked snake with the agitation rake without account.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕製造者平白無故地用抖動的耙子搖一條赤裸的蛇。

sentences.english: Grandma can shake the hula hoop for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶可以搖呼拉圈搖很久。

sentences.english: Alphas, Betas , and Logans were deployed to their appointed places.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾法機，貝塔機，搖石機也安排到了指定位置。

sentences.english: The monkeys shake the trees, trying to topple the nuts from the branches.
sentences.chinese: 猴子遙晃著樹，想把堅果從樹上搖下來。

sentences.english: Shake vigorously and pour into a rocks glass.
sentences.chinese: 搖大力爭取到的岩石玻璃。

sentences.english: The beggar rattled the coins in his tin.
sentences.chinese: 這乞丐把罐裏的硬幣搖得哐啷哐啷響。

sentences.english: Find a tree grown with fruits, shaking off several sweet fruits.
sentences.chinese: 找一棵結滿果子的樹，搖下幾棵甜美的果子。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the gravel road kicked up so much dust that I wasn’t allowed to roll down the window.
sentences.chinese: 然而，碎石路上揚起的灰塵太多，我不能搖下車窗。

sentences.english: In china waving hands means saying goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 在中國搖手錶示說再見。

definition: to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
